   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Test application config
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: 
   26: -module(megaco_config_SUITE).
   27: 
   28: -export([
   29:          suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   30: 	 init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1, 
   31: 	 init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2, 
   32: 	 init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2, 
   33: 
   34:          config/1,
   35:          transaction_id_counter_mg/1,
   36:          transaction_id_counter_mgc/1,
   37:          otp_7216/1,
   38:          otp_8167/1,
   39:          otp_8183/1
   40:         ]).
   41: 
   42: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   43: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco.hrl").
   44: -include_lib("megaco/src/app/megaco_internal.hrl").
   45: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   46: 
   47: -record(command, {id, desc, cmd, verify}).
   48: 
   49: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY,     debug).
   50: -define(CNT_PROCS_NUM,      100).
   51: -define(CNT_PROCS_CHUNK,    10).
   52: -define(MAX_TRANS_ID,       1000).
   53: -define(MAX_TRANS_ID_CHUNK, 100).
   54: 
   55: 
   56: %%======================================================================
   57: %% Common Test interface functions
   58: %%======================================================================
   59: 
   60: suite() -> 
   61:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   62: 
   63: all() -> 
   64:     [
   65:      config,
   66:      {group, transaction_id_counter},
   67:      {group, tickets}
   68:     ].
   69: 
   70: groups() -> 
   71:     [
   72:      {transaction_id_counter, [], transaction_id_counter_cases()},
   73:      {tickets,                [], tickets_cases()}
   74:     ].
   75: 
   76: 
   77: 
   78: transaction_id_counter_cases() ->
   79:     [
   80:      transaction_id_counter_mg,
   81:      transaction_id_counter_mgc
   82:     ].
   83: 
   84: tickets_cases() ->
   85:     [
   86:      otp_7216,
   87:      otp_8167,
   88:      otp_8183
   89:     ].
   90: 
   91: 
   92: 
   93: %%
   94: %% -----
   95: %%
   96: 
   97: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
   98: 
   99:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  100:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  101:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  102: 
  103:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite(Config0) of
  104:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  105:             SKIP;
  106: 
  107:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  108: 
  109:             %% We need a (local) monitor on this node also
  110:             megaco_test_sys_monitor:start(),
  111: 
  112:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  113:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  114:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  115:             
  116:             Config1
  117:     end.
  118: 
  119: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  120: 
  121:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  122:       "~n      Config0: ~p"
  123:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  124: 
  125:     megaco_test_sys_monitor:stop(),
  126:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  127: 
  128:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  129:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  130:     Config1.
  131: 
  132: 
  133: 
  134: %%
  135: %% -----
  136: %%
  137: 
  138: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  139:     Config.
  140: 
  141: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  142:     Config.
  143: 
  144: 
  145: %%
  146: %% -----
  147: %%
  148: 
  149: %% Test server callbacks
  150: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when (Case =/= config) ->
  151:     i("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  152:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  153:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  154: 
  155:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  156: 
  157:     i("try starting megaco_config"),
  158:     case megaco_config:start_link() of
  159:         {ok, _} ->
  160:             C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  161:             do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(3)}|C]);
  162:         {error, Reason} ->
  163:             i("Failed starting megaco_config: "
  164:               "~n   ~p", [Reason]),
  165:             {skip, ?F("Failed starting config: ~p", [Reason])}
  166:     end;
  167: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  168:     i("init_per_testcase -> entry with"
  169:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  170:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  171: 
  172:     megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:reset_events(),
  173: 
  174:     C = lists:keydelete(tc_timeout, 1, Config),
  175:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, [{tc_timeout, min(3)}|C]).
  176: 
  177: do_init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  178:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  179:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  180: 
  181: min(M) -> timer:minutes(M).
  182: 
  183: 
  184: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when (Case =/= config) ->
  185:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  186:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  187:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  188: 
  189:     p("system events during test: "
  190:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  191: 
  192:     (catch megaco_config:stop()),
  193:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  194:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  195: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  196:     p("end_per_testcase -> entry with"
  197:       "~n   Config: ~p"
  198:       "~n   Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  199: 
  200:     p("system events during test: "
  201:       "~n   ~p", [megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events()]),
  202: 
  203:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  204:     megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  205: 
  206: 
  207: 
  208: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  209: %% Config test case
  210: 
  211: config(suite) ->
  212:     [];
  213: config(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  214:     ?ACQUIRE_NODES(1, Config),
  215:     Mid = fake_mid,
  216:     
  217:     %% Nice values
  218:     Int = 3,
  219:     IT  = #megaco_incr_timer{max_retries = Int},
  220: 
  221:     %% Evil values
  222:     NonInt = non_int,
  223:     IT2 = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for = NonInt},
  224:     IT3 = #megaco_incr_timer{factor = NonInt},
  225:     IT4 = #megaco_incr_timer{max_retries = NonInt},
  226:     IT5 = #megaco_incr_timer{max_retries = non_infinity},
  227: 
  228:     %% Command range values
  229:     Initial = 100,
  230:     Verify  = 200,
  231:     Nice    = 300,
  232:     Evil    = 400,
  233:     End     = 500,
  234: 
  235:     InitialCmd = 
  236: 	fun(No, Desc, Cmd, VerifyVal) ->
  237: 		initial_command(Initial + No, Desc, Cmd, VerifyVal)
  238: 	end,
  239: 
  240:     VerifyCmd = 
  241: 	fun(M, No, Key, V) ->
  242: 		verify_user_default_command(M, Verify + No, Key, V)
  243: 	end,
  244: 
  245:     NiceCmd = 
  246: 	fun(M, No, Key, Val) ->
  247: 		nice_user_update_command(M, Nice + No, Key, Val)
  248: 	end,
  249: 
  250:     EvilCmd = 
  251: 	fun(M, No, Key, Val) ->
  252: 		evil_user_update_command(M, Evil + No, Key, Val)
  253: 	end,
  254:     
  255:     %% End commands
  256:     ExitCmd = 
  257: 	fun(No, Desc, Cmd) ->
  258: 		exit_command(End + No, Desc, Cmd)
  259: 	end,
  260:     ErrorCmd = 
  261: 	fun(No, Desc, Cmd, MainReason, TS) ->
  262: 		error_command(End + No, Desc, Cmd, MainReason, TS)
  263: 	end,
  264:     PlainCmd = 
  265: 	fun(No, Desc, Cmd, V) ->
  266: 		command(End + No, Desc, Cmd, V)
  267: 	end,
  268: 
  269:     Commands = 
  270: 	[
  271: 	 %% Initial commands
  272: 	 InitialCmd(0, 
  273: 		    "enable trace", 
  274: 		    fun() -> megaco:enable_trace(100, io) end, 
  275: 		    ok),
  276: 	 InitialCmd(1, 
  277: 		    "start", 
  278: 		    fun() -> megaco:start() end, 
  279: 		    ok),
  280: 	 InitialCmd(2, 
  281: 		    "Verify no active requests", 
  282: 		    fun() -> megaco:system_info(n_active_requests) end,
  283: 		    0),
  284: 	 InitialCmd(3, 
  285: 		    "Verify no active replies", 
  286: 		    fun() -> megaco:system_info(n_active_replies) end,
  287: 		    0),
  288: 	 InitialCmd(4, 
  289: 		    "Verify no active connections", 
  290: 		    fun() -> megaco:system_info(n_active_connections) end,
  291: 		    0), 
  292: 	 InitialCmd(5, 
  293: 		    "Verify no connections", 
  294: 		    fun() -> megaco:system_info(connections) end, 
  295: 		    []),
  296: 	 InitialCmd(6, 
  297: 		    "Verify no users", 
  298: 		    fun() -> megaco:system_info(users) end, 
  299: 		    []), 
  300: 	 InitialCmd(7, 
  301: 		    "Start user", 
  302: 		    fun() -> megaco:start_user(Mid, []) end, 
  303: 		    ok),
  304: 	 
  305: 
  306: 	 %% Verify user defaults
  307: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  1, connections, []),
  308: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  2, min_trans_id, 1), 
  309: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  3, max_trans_id, infinity), 
  310: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  4, request_timer, #megaco_incr_timer{}), 
  311: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  5, long_request_timer, timer:seconds(60)), 
  312: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  6, auto_ack, false), 
  313: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  7, pending_timer, 30000), 
  314: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  8, reply_timer, 30000), 
  315: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid,  9, send_mod, megaco_tcp), 
  316: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid, 10, encoding_mod, megaco_pretty_text_encoder), 
  317: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid, 11, encoding_config, []), 
  318: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid, 12, protocol_version, 1), 
  319: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid, 13, reply_data, undefined), 
  320: 	 VerifyCmd(Mid, 14, receive_handle, 
  321: 		   fun(H) when is_record(H, megaco_receive_handle) -> 
  322: 			   {ok, H};
  323: 		      (R)  -> 
  324: 			   {error, R}
  325: 		   end), 
  326: 
  327: 
  328: 	 %% Nice update
  329: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  1, min_trans_id, Int), 
  330: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  2, max_trans_id, Int), 
  331: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  3, max_trans_id, infinity), 
  332: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  4, request_timer, Int), 
  333: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  5, request_timer, infinity), 
  334: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  6, request_timer, IT), 
  335: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  7, long_request_timer, Int), 
  336: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  8, long_request_timer, infinity), 
  337: 	 NiceCmd(Mid,  9, long_request_timer, IT), 
  338: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 10, auto_ack, true), 
  339: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 11, auto_ack, false), 
  340: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 12, pending_timer, Int), 
  341: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 13, pending_timer, infinity), 
  342: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 14, pending_timer, IT), 
  343: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 15, reply_timer, Int), 
  344: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 16, reply_timer, infinity), 
  345: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 17, reply_timer, IT), 
  346: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 18, send_mod, an_atom), 
  347: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 19, encoding_mod, an_atom), 
  348: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 20, encoding_config, []), 
  349: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 21, protocol_version, Int), 
  350: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 23, reply_data, IT), 
  351: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 23, resend_indication, true), 
  352: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 24, resend_indication, false), 
  353: 	 NiceCmd(Mid, 25, resend_indication, flag),
  354: 
  355: 
  356: 	 %% Evil update
  357: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  1, min_trans_id, NonInt), 
  358: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  2, max_trans_id, NonInt), 
  359: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  3, max_trans_id, non_infinity), 
  360: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  4, request_timer, NonInt), 
  361: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  5, request_timer, non_infinity), 
  362: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  6, request_timer, IT2), 
  363: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  7, request_timer, IT3), 
  364: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  8, request_timer, IT4), 
  365: 	 EvilCmd(Mid,  9, request_timer, IT5), 
  366: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 10, long_request_timer, NonInt), 
  367: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 11, long_request_timer, non_infinity), 
  368: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 12, long_request_timer, IT2), 
  369: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 13, long_request_timer, IT3), 
  370: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 14, long_request_timer, IT4), 
  371: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 15, long_request_timer, IT5), 
  372: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 16, auto_ack, non_bool), 
  373: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 17, pending_timer, NonInt), 
  374: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 18, pending_timer, non_infinity), 
  375: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 19, pending_timer, IT2), 
  376: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 20, pending_timer, IT3), 
  377: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 21, pending_timer, IT4), 
  378: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 22, pending_timer, IT5), 
  379: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 23, reply_timer, NonInt), 
  380: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 24, reply_timer, non_infinity), 
  381: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 25, reply_timer, IT2), 
  382: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 26, reply_timer, IT3), 
  383: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 27, reply_timer, IT4), 
  384: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 28, reply_timer, IT5), 
  385: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 29, send_mod, {non_atom}), 
  386: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 30, encoding_mod, {non_atom}), 
  387: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 31, encoding_config, non_list), 
  388: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 32, protocol_version, NonInt),
  389: 	 EvilCmd(Mid, 33, resend_indication, flagg),
  390: 
  391: 
  392: 	 %% End 
  393: 	 ExitCmd(1, "Verify non-existing system info", 
  394: 		 fun() -> megaco:system_info(non_exist) end),
  395: 	 ExitCmd(2, "Verify non-existing user user info", 
  396: 		 fun() -> megaco:user_info(non_exist, trans_id) end),
  397: 	 ExitCmd(3, "Verify non-existing user info", 
  398: 		 fun() -> megaco:user_info(Mid, non_exist) end),
  399: 
  400: 	 ErrorCmd(4, "Try updating user info for non-existing user", 
  401: 		  fun() -> 
  402: 			  megaco:update_user_info(non_exist, trans_id, 1) 
  403: 		  end,
  404: 		  no_such_user, 2),
  405: 	 ErrorCmd(11, "Try updating non-existing user info", 
  406: 		  fun() -> 
  407: 			  megaco:update_user_info(Mid, trans_id, 4711) 
  408: 		  end,
  409: 		  bad_user_val, 4),
  410: 	 ErrorCmd(12, "Try start already started user", 
  411: 		  fun() -> megaco:start_user(Mid, []) end,
  412: 		  user_already_exists, 2),
  413: 
  414: 	 PlainCmd(13, "Verify started users", 
  415: 		  fun() -> megaco:system_info(users) end, [Mid]),
  416: 	 PlainCmd(14, "Stop user", fun() -> megaco:stop_user(Mid) end, ok),
  417: 	 PlainCmd(15, "Verify started users", 
  418: 		  fun() -> megaco:system_info(users) end, []),
  419: 	 ErrorCmd(16, "Try stop not started user",
  420: 		  fun() -> megaco:stop_user(Mid) end, no_such_user, 2),
  421: 	 ErrorCmd(17, "Try start megaco (it's already started)",
  422: 		  fun() -> megaco:start() end, already_started, 2),
  423: 	 PlainCmd(18, "Stop megaco", fun() -> megaco:stop() end, ok),
  424: 	 ErrorCmd(19, "Try stop megaco (it's not running)",
  425: 		  fun() -> megaco:stop() end, not_started, 2)
  426: 	],
  427: 
  428:     
  429:     exec(Commands).
  430:     
  431: 
  432: 
  433: exec([]) ->
  434:     ok;
  435: exec([#command{id     = No, 
  436: 	       desc   = Desc, 
  437: 	       cmd    = Cmd, 
  438: 	       verify = Verify}|Commands]) ->
  439:     io:format("Executing command ~3w: ~s: ", [No, Desc]),
  440:     case (catch Verify((catch Cmd()))) of
  441: 	{ok, OK} ->
  442: 	    io:format("ok => ~p~n", [OK]),
  443: 	    exec(Commands);
  444: 	{error, Reason} ->
  445: 	    io:format("error => ~p~n", [Reason]),
  446: 	    {error, {bad_result, No, Reason}};
  447: 	Error ->
  448: 	    io:format("exit => ~p~n", [Error]),
  449: 	    {error, {unexpected_result, No, Error}}
  450:     end.
  451: 
  452: initial_command(No, Desc0, Cmd, VerifyVal) when is_function(Cmd) ->
  453:     Desc = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Initial - ~s", [Desc0])),
  454:     command(No, Desc, Cmd, VerifyVal).
  455:     
  456: verify_user_default_command(Mid, No, Key, Verify) ->
  457:     Desc = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Defaults - Verify ~w", [Key])),
  458:     Cmd = fun() -> megaco:user_info(Mid, Key) end,
  459:     command(No, Desc, Cmd, Verify).
  460: 		     
  461: nice_user_update_command(Mid, No, Key, Val) ->
  462:     Desc = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Nice - Update ~w", [Key])),
  463:     Cmd = fun() -> megaco:update_user_info(Mid, Key, Val) end,
  464:     Verify = fun(ok) ->
  465: 		     case (catch megaco:user_info(Mid, Key)) of
  466: 			 {'EXIT', R} ->
  467: 			     {error, {value_retreival_failed, R}};
  468: 			 Val ->
  469: 			     {ok, Val};
  470: 			 Invalid ->
  471: 			     {error, {value_update_failed, Val, Invalid}}
  472: 		     end;
  473: 		(R)  -> 
  474: 		     {error, R}
  475: 	     end,
  476:     command(No, Desc, Cmd, Verify).
  477: 
  478: 
  479: evil_user_update_command(Mid, No, Key, Val) ->
  480:     Desc = lists:flatten(io_lib:format("Evil - Update ~w", [Key])),
  481:     Cmd = fun() ->
  482: 		  case (catch megaco:user_info(Mid, Key)) of
  483: 		      {'EXIT', R} ->
  484: 			  {{error, {old_value_retreival_failed, R}}, 
  485: 			   ignore};
  486: 		      OldVal ->
  487: 			  {OldVal,
  488: 			   (catch megaco:update_user_info(Mid, Key, Val))}
  489: 		  end
  490: 	  end,
  491:     Verify = fun({{error, _} = Error, ignore}) ->
  492: 		     Error;
  493: 		({OldVal, {error, {bad_user_val, _, _, _}}}) ->
  494: 		     case (catch megaco:user_info(Mid, Key)) of
  495: 			 {'EXIT', R} ->
  496: 			     {error, {value_retreival_failed, R}};
  497: 			 OldVal ->
  498: 			     {ok, OldVal};
  499: 			 Invalid ->
  500: 			     {error, {value_update_failed, OldVal, Invalid}}
  501: 		     end;
  502: 		(R) ->
  503: 		     {error, R}
  504: 	     end,
  505:     command(No, Desc, Cmd, Verify).
  506: 
  507: exit_command(No, Desc, Cmd) when is_function(Cmd) ->    
  508:     Verify = fun({'EXIT', _} = E) ->
  509: 		     {ok, E};
  510: 		(R) ->
  511: 		     {error, R}
  512: 	     end,
  513:     command(No, Desc, Cmd, Verify).
  514: 
  515: error_command(No, Desc, Cmd, MainReason, TS) when is_function(Cmd) ->
  516:     Verify = fun({error, Reason}) ->
  517: 		     io:format("verify -> Reason: ~n~p~n", [Reason]), 
  518: 		     case Reason of
  519: 			 {MainReason, _} when TS == 2 ->
  520: 			     {ok, MainReason};
  521: 			 {MainReason, _, _, _} when TS == 4 ->
  522: 			     {ok, MainReason};
  523: 			 _ ->
  524: 			     {error, Reason}
  525: 		     end;
  526: 		(R) ->
  527: 		     {error, R}
  528: 	     end,
  529:     command(No, Desc, Cmd, Verify).
  530: 
  531: command(No, Desc, Cmd, Verify) 
  532:   when (is_integer(No) andalso 
  533: 	is_list(Desc) andalso 
  534: 	is_function(Cmd) andalso 
  535: 	is_function(Verify)) ->
  536:     #command{id     = No, 
  537: 	     desc   = Desc,
  538: 	     cmd    = Cmd,
  539: 	     verify = Verify};
  540: command(No, Desc, Cmd, VerifyVal) 
  541:   when (is_integer(No) andalso 
  542: 	is_list(Desc) andalso 
  543: 	is_function(Cmd)) ->
  544:     Verify = fun(Val) ->
  545: 		     case Val of
  546: 			 VerifyVal ->
  547: 			     {ok, Val};
  548: 			 _ ->
  549: 			     {error, Val}
  550: 		     end
  551: 	     end,
  552:     #command{id     = No, 
  553: 	     desc   = Desc,
  554: 	     cmd    = Cmd,
  555: 	     verify = Verify}.
  556:     
  557: 
  558: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  559: 
  560: calc_max_trans_id(Config) ->
  561:     calc_number(Config, ?MAX_TRANS_ID_CHUNK, ?MAX_TRANS_ID).
  562: 
  563: calc_num_cnt_procs(Config) ->
  564:     calc_number(Config, ?CNT_PROCS_CHUNK, ?CNT_PROCS_NUM).
  565: 
  566: calc_number(Config, Chunk, Max) ->
  567:     Factor = ?config(megaco_factor, Config),
  568:     if
  569:         (Factor =:= 1) ->
  570:             Max;
  571:         (Factor < 10) ->
  572:             calc_number2(Factor, Chunk, Max);
  573:         true ->
  574:             calc_number2(10, Chunk, Max)
  575:     end.
  576: 
  577: calc_number2(Factor, Chunk, Max) ->
  578:     Max - ((Factor-1) * Chunk).
  579: 
  580: 
  581: transaction_id_counter_mg(suite) ->
  582:     [];
  583: transaction_id_counter_mg(doc) ->
  584:     ["This test case is intended to test and verify the "
  585:      "transaction counter handling of the application "
  586:      "in with one connection (MG). "];
  587: transaction_id_counter_mg(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  588:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
  589:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
  590:     put(tc,        ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  591:     
  592:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  593: 
  594:     MaxTransID  = calc_max_trans_id(Config),
  595:     NumCntProcs = calc_num_cnt_procs(Config),
  596: 
  597:     i("starting with"
  598:       "~n      Max Transaction ID:      ~w"
  599:       "~n      Number Of Counter Procs: ~w", [MaxTransID, NumCntProcs]),
  600: 
  601:     %% Basic user data
  602:     UserMid = {deviceName, "mg"},
  603:     UserConfig = [
  604: 		  {min_trans_id, 1}
  605: 		 ],
  606: 
  607:     %% Basic connection data
  608:     RemoteMid = {deviceName, "mgc"},
  609:     RecvHandle = #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid       = UserMid,
  610: 					encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  611: 					encoding_config = [],
  612: 					send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  613:     SendHandle = dummy_send_handle,
  614:     ControlPid = self(), 
  615: 
  616:     %% Start user
  617:     i("start user"),
  618:     ok = megaco_config:start_user(UserMid, UserConfig),
  619: 
  620:     %% Create connection
  621:     i("create connection"),
  622:     {ok, CD} = 
  623: 	megaco_config:connect(RecvHandle, RemoteMid, SendHandle, ControlPid),
  624: 
  625:     %% Set counter limits
  626:     i("set counter max limit"),
  627:     CH = CD#conn_data.conn_handle, 
  628:     megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, max_trans_id, MaxTransID),
  629: 
  630:     %% Create the counter worker procs
  631:     i("create ~w counter working procs", [NumCntProcs]),
  632:     Pids = create_counter_working_procs(CH, NumCntProcs, []),
  633: 
  634:     %% Start the counter worker procs
  635:     i("release the counter working procs"),
  636:     start_counter_working_procs(Pids),
  637: 
  638:     %% Await the counter worker procs termination
  639:     i("await the counter working procs completion"),
  640:     ok = await_completion_counter_working_procs(Pids),
  641: 
  642:     %% Verify result
  643:     i("verify counter result"),
  644:     TransId = megaco_config:conn_info(CH, trans_id),
  645:     1 = TransId,
  646: 
  647:     %% Stop test
  648:     i("disconnect"),
  649:     {ok, _, _} = megaco_config:disconnect(CH),
  650:     i("stop user"),
  651:     ok = megaco_config:stop_user(UserMid),
  652: 
  653:     i("done"),
  654:     ok.
  655: 
  656: 
  657: 
  658: create_counter_working_procs(_CH, 0, Pids) ->
  659:     Pids;
  660: create_counter_working_procs(CH, N, Pids) ->
  661:     TC = get(tc),
  662:     Pid = erlang:spawn_link(fun() -> counter_init(CH, TC) end),
  663:     create_counter_working_procs(CH, N-1, [Pid | Pids]).
  664: 
  665: counter_init(CH, TC) ->
  666:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
  667:     put(sname,     lists:flatten(io_lib:format("CNT-~p", [self()]))),
  668:     put(tc,        TC),    
  669:     UserMid = CH#megaco_conn_handle.local_mid,
  670:     Min = megaco_config:user_info(UserMid, min_trans_id),
  671:     Max = megaco_config:conn_info(CH, max_trans_id),
  672:     Num = Max - Min + 1,
  673:     receive
  674: 	start ->
  675: 	    %% i("received start command (~p)", [Num]),
  676: 	    ok
  677:     end,
  678:     counter_loop(CH, Num).
  679: 
  680: counter_loop(_CH, 0) ->
  681:     %% i("done"),
  682:     exit(normal);
  683: counter_loop(CH, Num) when (Num > 0) ->
  684:     megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 1),
  685:     counter_loop(CH, Num-1).
  686: 
  687: start_counter_working_procs([]) ->
  688:     %% i("released"),
  689:     ok;
  690: start_counter_working_procs([Pid | Pids]) ->
  691:     Pid ! start,
  692:     start_counter_working_procs(Pids).
  693: 
  694: await_completion_counter_working_procs(Pids) ->
  695:     await_completion_counter_working_procs(0, ts(), Pids, [], []).
  696: 
  697: await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD, _TS, [], _OKs, [] = _ERRs) ->
  698:     i("done when ok with max TS-diff: ~p", [MaxTSD]),
  699:     ok;
  700: await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD, _TS, [], _OKs, ERRs) ->
  701:     i("done when error (~w) with max TS-diff: ~p", [length(ERRs), MaxTSD]),
  702:     {error, ERRs};
  703: await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD, TS, Pids, OKs, ERRs) ->
  704:     receive
  705: 	{'EXIT', Pid, normal} ->
  706:             %% i("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  707:             %%   "Expected exit from counter process: "
  708:             %%   "~n      Time since last event: ~s"
  709:             %%   "~n      Pid: ~p",
  710:             %%   [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs), tsd(TS), Pid]),
  711:             TSD = ts() - TS,
  712:             MaxTSD2 =
  713:                 if (TSD > MaxTSD) ->
  714:                         i("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  715:                           "Expected exit from counter process: "
  716:                           "~n      New max time since last event: ~s"
  717:                           "~n      Pid: ~p",
  718:                           [length(Pids),
  719:                            length(OKs),
  720:                            length(ERRs),
  721:                            tsd(TSD),
  722:                            Pid]),
  723:                         TSD;
  724:                    true ->
  725:                         MaxTSD
  726:                 end,
  727: 	    Pids2 = lists:delete(Pid, Pids),
  728: 	    await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD2, ts(),
  729:                                                    Pids2, [Pid | OKs], ERRs);
  730: 
  731: 	{'EXIT', Pid, {timetrap_timeout, _Timeout, Stack} = _Reason} ->
  732:             TSD = ts() - TS,
  733:             MaxTSD2 =
  734:                 if (TSD > MaxTSD) ->
  735:                         TSD;
  736:                    true ->
  737:                         MaxTSD
  738:                 end,
  739:             e("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  740:               "Test case timeout timetrap"
  741:               "~n      Time since last event: ~s (max ~s)"
  742:               "~n      Pid:                   ~p (~p)"
  743:               "~n      Stack:                 ~p",
  744:               [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs),
  745:                tsd(TSD), tsd(MaxTSD2),
  746:                Pid, lists:member(Pid, Pids),
  747:                Stack]),
  748:             %% The test case (timetrap) has timed out, which either means
  749:             %% we are running on very slow hw or some system functions
  750:             %% are slowing us down (this test case should never normally
  751:             %% time out).
  752:             case megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events(?SECS(5)) of
  753:                 {error, timeout} ->
  754:                     i("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  755:                       "idle:sys-mon timeout",
  756:                       [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs)]),
  757:                     ?SKIP("TC idle; sys-monitor evs timeout");
  758:                 [] ->
  759:                     i("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> idle",
  760:                       [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs)]),
  761:                     ?SKIP("TC idle");
  762:                 SysEvs ->
  763:                     e("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  764:                       "system event(s): "
  765:                       "~n      ~p",
  766:                       [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs), SysEvs]),
  767:                     ?SKIP("TC system events")
  768:             end;
  769: 
  770: 	{'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  771:             TSD = ts() - TS,
  772:             MaxTSD2 =
  773:                 if (TSD > MaxTSD) ->
  774:                         TSD;
  775:                    true ->
  776:                         MaxTSD
  777:                 end,
  778:             e("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  779:               "Unexpected exit from counter process: "
  780:               "~n      Time since last event: ~s (max ~s)"
  781:               "~n      Pid:                   ~p"
  782:               "~n      Reason:                ~p",
  783:               [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs),
  784:                tsd(TSD), tsd(MaxTSD2),
  785:                Pid, Reason]),
  786: 	    Pids2 = lists:delete(Pid, Pids),
  787: 	    await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD2, ts(),
  788:                                                    Pids2, OKs, [Pid | ERRs]);
  789: 
  790: 	Any ->
  791:             TSD = ts() - TS,
  792:             MaxTSD2 =
  793:                 if (TSD > MaxTSD) ->
  794:                         TSD;
  795:                    true ->
  796:                         MaxTSD
  797:                 end,
  798:             e("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  799:               "Unexpected message: "
  800:               "~n      Time since last event: ~s (max ~s)"
  801:               "~n      ~p",
  802:               [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs),
  803:                tsd(TSD), tsd(MaxTSD2),
  804:                Any]),
  805: 	    await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD2, TS,
  806:                                                    Pids, OKs, ERRs)
  807: 
  808:     after 1000 ->
  809:             %% If nothing has happened for this long, something is wrong:
  810:             %% Check system events
  811:             TS2 = ts(),
  812:             TSD = TS2 - TS,
  813:             case megaco_test_global_sys_monitor:events() of
  814:                 [] ->
  815:                     TS3 = ts(),
  816:                     i("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> idle"
  817:                       "~n      Time since last event:       ~s"
  818:                       "~n      (global) sys monitor events: ~s",
  819:                       [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs),
  820:                        tsd(TSD), tsd(TS3 - TS2)]),
  821:                     await_completion_counter_working_procs(MaxTSD, TS,
  822:                                                            Pids, OKs, ERRs);
  823:                 SysEvs ->
  824:                     TS3 = ts(),
  825:                     e("counter working process completion[~w, ~w, ~w] -> "
  826:                       "system event(s): "
  827:                       "~n      Time since last event:       ~s"
  828:                       "~n      (global) sys monitor events: ~s"
  829:                       "~n      ~p",
  830:                       [length(Pids), length(OKs), length(ERRs),
  831:                        tsd(TSD), tsd(TS3 - TS2),
  832:                        SysEvs]),
  833:                     ?SKIP("TC idle with system events")
  834:             end
  835:     end.
  836:     
  837: 
  838: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  839: 
  840: transaction_id_counter_mgc(suite) ->
  841:     [];
  842: transaction_id_counter_mgc(doc) ->
  843:     ["This test case is intended to test and verify the "
  844:      "transaction counter handling of the application "
  845:      "in with several connections (MGC). "];
  846: transaction_id_counter_mgc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  847:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
  848:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
  849:     put(tc,        ?FUNCTION_NAME),
  850:     
  851:     Name        = ?FUNCTION_NAME,
  852:     MaxTransID  = calc_max_trans_id(Config),
  853:     NumCntProcs = calc_num_cnt_procs(Config),                   
  854: 
  855:     i("starting with"
  856:       "~n      Max Transaction ID:      ~w"
  857:       "~n      Number Of Counter Procs: ~w", [MaxTransID, NumCntProcs]),
  858: 
  859:     Pre = fun() ->
  860:                   %% Basic user data
  861:                   UserMid = {deviceName, "mgc"},
  862:                   UserConfig = [
  863:                                 {min_trans_id, 1}
  864:                                ],
  865: 
  866:                   %% Basic connection data
  867:                   RemoteMids = 
  868:                       [
  869:                        {deviceName, "mg01"},
  870:                        {deviceName, "mg02"},
  871:                        {deviceName, "mg03"},
  872:                        {deviceName, "mg04"},
  873:                        {deviceName, "mg05"},
  874:                        {deviceName, "mg06"},
  875:                        {deviceName, "mg07"},
  876:                        {deviceName, "mg08"},
  877:                        {deviceName, "mg09"},
  878:                        {deviceName, "mg10"}
  879:                       ], 
  880:                   RecvHandles = 
  881:                       [
  882:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  883:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  884:                                               encoding_config = [],
  885:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  886:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  887:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  888:                                               encoding_config = [],
  889:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  890:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  891:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  892:                                               encoding_config = [],
  893:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  894:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  895:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  896:                                               encoding_config = [],
  897:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  898:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  899:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  900:                                               encoding_config = [],
  901:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  902:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  903:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  904:                                               encoding_config = [],
  905:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  906:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  907:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  908:                                               encoding_config = [],
  909:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  910:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  911:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  912:                                               encoding_config = [],
  913:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  914:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  915:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  916:                                               encoding_config = [],
  917:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE},
  918:                        #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid     = UserMid,
  919:                                               encoding_mod    = ?MODULE,
  920:                                               encoding_config = [],
  921:                                               send_mod        = ?MODULE}
  922:                       ],
  923:                   SendHandle = dummy_send_handle,
  924:                   ControlPid = self(),
  925:     
  926:                   %% Start user
  927:                   i("start user"),
  928:                   ok = megaco_config:start_user(UserMid, UserConfig),
  929: 
  930:                   %% Create connection
  931:                   i("create connection(s)"),
  932:                   CDs = create_connections(RecvHandles,
  933:                                            RemoteMids,
  934:                                            SendHandle,
  935:                                            ControlPid),
  936: 
  937:                   %% Set counter limits
  938:                   i("set counter max limit(s)"),
  939:                   set_counter_max_limits(CDs, MaxTransID),
  940: 
  941:                   {UserMid, CDs}
  942:           end,
  943: 
  944:     Case = fun({_, CDs}) ->
  945:                    %% Create the counter worker procs
  946:                    i("create ~w counter working procs", [NumCntProcs]),
  947:                    Pids = create_counter_working_procs(CDs, NumCntProcs),
  948: 
  949:                    %% Start the counter worker procs
  950:                    i("release the counter working procs"),
  951:                    start_counter_working_procs(Pids),
  952: 
  953:                    %% Await the counter worker procs termination
  954:                    i("await the counter working procs completion"),
  955:                    ok = await_completion_counter_working_procs(Pids),
  956: 
  957:                    %% Verify result
  958:                    i("verify counter result"),
  959:                    verify_counter_results(CDs)
  960:            end,
  961: 
  962:     Post = fun({UserMid, CDs}) ->
  963:                    %% Stop test
  964:                    i("disconnect"),
  965:                    delete_connections(CDs), 
  966:                    i("stop user"),
  967:                    ok = megaco_config:stop_user(UserMid),
  968:                    i("done"),
  969:                    ok
  970:            end,
  971:     try_tc(Name, Pre, Case, Post).
  972: 
  973: 
  974: create_connections(RecvHandles, RemoteMids, SendHandle, ControlPid) ->
  975:     create_connections(RecvHandles, RemoteMids, SendHandle, ControlPid, []).
  976: 
  977: create_connections([], [], _SendHandle, _ControlPid, Acc) ->
  978:     lists:reverse(Acc);
  979: create_connections([RecvHandle | RecvHandles], 
  980: 		   [RemoteMid  | RemoteMids], 
  981: 		   SendHandle, ControlPid, Acc) ->
  982:     {ok, CD} = 
  983: 	megaco_config:connect(RecvHandle, RemoteMid, SendHandle, ControlPid),
  984:     create_connections(RecvHandles, RemoteMids, 
  985: 		       SendHandle, ControlPid, [CD | Acc]).
  986: 
  987: 
  988: set_counter_max_limits([], _MaxTransId) ->
  989:     ok;
  990: set_counter_max_limits([#conn_data{conn_handle = CH} | CDs], MaxTransId) ->
  991:     megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, max_trans_id, MaxTransId),
  992:     set_counter_max_limits(CDs, MaxTransId).
  993:     
  994: 
  995: create_counter_working_procs(CDs, NumCntProcs) ->
  996:     lists:flatten(create_counter_working_procs2(CDs, NumCntProcs)).
  997: 
  998: create_counter_working_procs2([], _NumCntProcs) ->
  999:     [];
 1000: create_counter_working_procs2([#conn_data{conn_handle = CH} | CDs], 
 1001: 			      NumCntProcs) ->
 1002:     [create_counter_working_procs(CH, NumCntProcs, []) |
 1003:      create_counter_working_procs2(CDs, NumCntProcs)].
 1004: 
 1005: 
 1006: verify_counter_results(CDs) ->
 1007:     verify_counter_results(CDs, [], []).
 1008: 
 1009: verify_counter_results([], _OKs, [] = _Errors) ->
 1010:     i("counter verification success"),
 1011:     ok;
 1012: verify_counter_results([], OKs, Errors) ->
 1013:     e("counter verification failed: "
 1014:       "~n      Num OKs:    ~p"
 1015:       "~n      Num Errors: ~p", [length(OKs), length(Errors)]),
 1016:     error;
 1017: verify_counter_results([#conn_data{conn_handle = CH} = CD| CDs], OKs, Errors) ->
 1018:     TransId = megaco_config:conn_info(CH, trans_id),
 1019:     if
 1020: 	(TransId =:= 1) ->
 1021: 	    verify_counter_results(CDs, [CD|OKs], Errors);
 1022: 	true ->
 1023:             e("invalid transaction is for connection: "
 1024:               "~n      CD:      ~p"
 1025:               "~n      TransId: ~p", [CD, TransId]),
 1026:             verify_counter_results(CDs, OKs, [{CD, TransId}|Errors])
 1027:     end.
 1028: 
 1029: 
 1030: delete_connections([]) ->
 1031:     ok;
 1032: delete_connections([#conn_data{conn_handle = CH} | CDs]) ->
 1033:     {ok, _, _} = megaco_config:disconnect(CH),
 1034:     delete_connections(CDs).
 1035: 
 1036:     
 1037: 
 1038: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1039: 
 1040: otp_7216(suite) ->
 1041:     [];
 1042: otp_7216(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1043:     put(tc, otp_7216),
 1044:     p("start"),
 1045: 
 1046:     LocalMid1 = {deviceName, "local-mid-1"},
 1047:     %% LocalMid2 = {deviceName, "local-mid-2"},
 1048:     RemoteMid1 = {deviceName, "remote-mid-1"},
 1049:     %% RemoteMid2 = {deviceName, "remote-mid-2"},
 1050:     RH = #megaco_receive_handle{local_mid       = LocalMid1,
 1051: 				encoding_mod    = dummy_codec_module,
 1052: 				encoding_config = [],
 1053: 				send_mod        = dummy_transport_module},
 1054:     MinTransId = 7216,
 1055:     MaxTransId = MinTransId + 10,
 1056:     User1Config = [{min_trans_id, MinTransId},
 1057: 		   {max_trans_id, MaxTransId}], 
 1058: 
 1059:     VerifySerial = 
 1060: 	fun(Actual, Expected) ->
 1061: 		if
 1062: 		    Actual == Expected ->
 1063: 			ok;
 1064: 		    true ->
 1065: 			throw({error, {invalid_counter_value, Actual}})
 1066: 		end
 1067: 	end,
 1068: 
 1069:     p("start local user: ~p", [LocalMid1]),
 1070:     ok = megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid1, User1Config),
 1071: 
 1072:     p("connect"),
 1073:     {ok, CD} = megaco_config:connect(RH, RemoteMid1, 
 1074: 				     dummy_send_handle, self()),
 1075:     p("connect ok: CD = ~n~p", [CD]),
 1076:     CH = CD#conn_data.conn_handle,
 1077: 
 1078:     
 1079:     p("*** make the first counter increment ***"),
 1080:     {ok, CD01} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 1),
 1081:     Serial01   = CD01#conn_data.serial,
 1082:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial01]),
 1083:     VerifySerial(Serial01, MinTransId),
 1084:     p("counter increment 1 ok"),    
 1085: 
 1086: 
 1087:     p("*** make two more counter increments ***"),
 1088:     {ok, _} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 1),
 1089:     {ok, CD02} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 1),
 1090:     Serial02   = CD02#conn_data.serial,
 1091:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial02]),
 1092:     VerifySerial(Serial02, MinTransId+2),
 1093:     p("counter increment 2 ok"), 
 1094: 
 1095:     
 1096:     p("*** make a big counter increment ***"),
 1097:     {ok, CD03} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 8),
 1098:     Serial03   = CD03#conn_data.serial,
 1099:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial03]),
 1100:     VerifySerial(Serial03, MinTransId+2+8),
 1101:     p("counter increment 3 ok"), 
 1102: 
 1103:     
 1104:     p("*** make a wrap-around counter increment ***"),
 1105:     {ok, CD04} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 1),
 1106:     Serial04   = CD04#conn_data.serial,
 1107:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial04]),
 1108:     VerifySerial(Serial04, MinTransId),
 1109:     p("counter increment 4 ok"), 
 1110: 
 1111: 
 1112:     p("*** make a big counter increment ***"),
 1113:     {ok, CD05} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 10),
 1114:     Serial05   = CD05#conn_data.serial,
 1115:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial05]),
 1116:     VerifySerial(Serial05, MinTransId+10),
 1117:     p("counter increment 5 ok"), 
 1118: 
 1119:     
 1120:     p("*** make a big wrap-around counter increment ***"),
 1121:     {ok, CD06} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 3),
 1122:     Serial06   = CD06#conn_data.serial,
 1123:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial06]),
 1124:     VerifySerial(Serial06, MinTransId+(3-1)),
 1125:     p("counter increment 6 ok"), 
 1126: 
 1127: 
 1128:     p("*** make a big counter increment ***"),
 1129:     {ok, CD07} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 7),
 1130:     Serial07   = CD07#conn_data.serial,
 1131:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial07]),
 1132:     VerifySerial(Serial07, MinTransId+(3-1)+7),
 1133:     p("counter increment 7 ok"), 
 1134: 
 1135: 
 1136:     p("*** make a big wrap-around counter increment ***"),
 1137:     {ok, CD08} = megaco_config:incr_trans_id_counter(CH, 5),
 1138:     Serial08   = CD08#conn_data.serial,
 1139:     p("serial: ~p", [Serial08]),
 1140:     VerifySerial(Serial08, MinTransId+(5-1-1)),
 1141:     p("counter increment 8 ok"), 
 1142: 
 1143: 
 1144:     p("disconnect"),
 1145:     {ok, CD, RCD} = megaco_config:disconnect(CH),
 1146:     p("disconnect ok: RCD = ~n~p", [RCD]),
 1147: 
 1148:     p("stop user"),
 1149:     ok = megaco_config:stop_user(LocalMid1),
 1150: 
 1151:     p("stop megaco config process"),
 1152:     megaco_config:stop(),
 1153: 
 1154:     p("done"),
 1155:     ok.
 1156:

 1193:     p("try (and fail) change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for local user: ~p -> ~p",

 1204: 	megaco_config:update_user_info(LocalMid1, call_proxy_gc_timeout, "1"),
 1205:     p("try (and fail) change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for local user: ~p -> ~p", 
 1206:       [LocalMid1, 1.0]),

 1208: 	megaco_config:update_user_info(LocalMid1, call_proxy_gc_timeout, 1.0),
 1209:     p("change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for local user: ~p", [LocalMid1]),

 1211:     
 1212:     p("connect"),
 1213:     {ok, CD} = megaco_config:connect(RH1, RemoteMid1, 
 1214: 				     dummy_send_handle, self()),
 1215:     p("connect ok: CD = ~n~p", [CD]),
 1216:     CH = CD#conn_data.conn_handle,
 1217: 
 1218:     p("get value for item cancel from connection: ~p", [CH]),
 1219:     false = megaco_config:conn_info(CH, cancel),
 1220: 
 1221:     p("get value for item cancel from connection data", []),
 1222:     false = megaco_config:conn_info(CD, cancel),
 1223: 
 1224:     p("get value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for connection: ~p", [CH]),
 1225:     10101 = megaco_config:conn_info(CH, call_proxy_gc_timeout),
 1226: 
 1227:     p("change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for connection: ~p -> ~p", 
 1228:       [CH, 20202]),
 1229:     ok = megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, call_proxy_gc_timeout, 20202),
 1230: 
 1231:     p("try (and fail) change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for connection: ~p -> ~p", 
 1232:       [CH, -1]),
 1233:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid1, call_proxy_gc_timeout, -1}} = 
 1234: 	megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, call_proxy_gc_timeout, -1),
 1235: 
 1236:     p("try (and fail) change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for connection: ~p -> ~p", 
 1237:       [CH, infinity]),
 1238:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid1, call_proxy_gc_timeout, infinity}} = 
 1239: 	megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, call_proxy_gc_timeout, infinity),
 1240: 
 1241:     p("try (and fail) change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for connection: ~p -> ~p", 
 1242:       [CH, "1"]),
 1243:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid1, call_proxy_gc_timeout, "1"}} = 
 1244: 	megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, call_proxy_gc_timeout, "1"),
 1245: 
 1246:     p("try (and fail) change value for item call_proxy_gc_timeout for connection: ~p -> ~p", 
 1247:       [CH, 1.0]),
 1248:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid1, call_proxy_gc_timeout, 1.0}} = 
 1249: 	megaco_config:update_conn_info(CH, call_proxy_gc_timeout, 1.0),
 1250: 
 1251:     p("disconnect: ~p", [CH]),
 1252:     {ok, _, _} = megaco_config:disconnect(CH),
 1253: 
 1254:     p("stop local user (1B): ~p", [LocalMid1]),
 1255:     ok = megaco_config:stop_user(LocalMid1),
 1256: 
 1257:     p("try (and fail) start local user (2A): ~p", [LocalMid2]),
 1258:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid2, call_proxy_gc_timeout, -1}} = 
 1259: 	megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid2, User2ConfigA),
 1260: 
 1261:     p("try (and fail) start local user (2B): ~p", [LocalMid2]),

 1263: 	megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid2, User2ConfigB),
 1264: 
 1265:     p("try (and fail) start local user (2C): ~p", [LocalMid2]),
 1266:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid2, call_proxy_gc_timeout, "1"}} = 
 1267: 	megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid2, User2ConfigC),
 1268: 
 1269:     p("try (and fail) start local user (2D): ~p", [LocalMid2]),
 1270:     {error, {bad_user_val, LocalMid2, call_proxy_gc_timeout, 1.0}} = 
 1271: 	megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid2, User2ConfigD),

 1323:     ok = megaco_config:stop_user(LocalMid1),

 1326:     ok = megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid1, User1ConfigC),

 1370:       [CH, BadValB]),

 1400: 	megaco_config:start_user(LocalMid2, User2ConfigC),
 1401:

 1409: 
 1410: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1411: 
 1412: try_tc(TCName, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 1413:     try_tc(TCName, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Pre, Case, Post).
 1414: 
 1415: try_tc(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post) ->
 1416:     ?TRY_TC(TCName, Name, Verbosity, Pre, Case, Post).
 1417: 
 1418: 
 1419: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1420: 
 1421: ts() ->
 1422:     erlang:monotonic_time(milli_seconds).
 1423: 
 1424: tsd(TSD) ->
 1425:     if (TSD < 1000) ->
 1426:             ?F("~w ms", [TSD]);
 1427:        (TSD < 60000) ->
 1428:             ?F("~w secs", [TSD div 1000]);
 1429:        true ->
 1430:             ?F("~w mins", [TSD div 60000])
 1431:     end.
 1432: 
 1433: 
 1434: 
 1435: 
 1436: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
 1437: 
 1438: p(F) ->
 1439:     p(F, []).
 1440: 
 1441: p(F, A) ->
 1442:     case get(tc) of
 1443:         undefined ->
 1444:             io:format(F ++ "~n", A);
 1445:         TC ->
 1446:             io:format("[~w] " ++ F ++ "~n", [TC|A])
 1447:     end.
 1448: 
 1449: 
 1450: i(F) ->
 1451:     i(F, []).
 1452: 
 1453: i(F, A) ->
 1454:     print(info, get(verbosity), get(tc), "INFO", F, A).
 1455: 
 1456: e(F, A) ->
 1457:     print(info, get(verbosity), get(tc), "ERROR", F, A).
 1458: 
 1459: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
 1460: printable(info, info) -> true;
 1461: printable(_,_)        -> false.
 1462: 
 1463: print(Severity, Verbosity, Tc, P, F, A) ->
 1464:     print(printable(Severity,Verbosity), Tc, P, F, A).
 1465: 
 1466: print(true, Tc, P, F, A) ->
 1467:     io:format("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s:~w ***"
 1468:               "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n",
 1469:               [?FTS(), P, self(), get(sname), Tc | A]);
 1470: print(_, _, _, _, _) ->
 1471:     ok.
